title: Royal Rumble (2018)
summary: The 2018 Royal Rumble was the 31st annual Royal Rumble professional wrestling event produced by WWE. It was held for wrestlers from the promotion's Raw and SmackDown brand divisions. The event aired on pay-per-view (PPV) and the WWE Network and took place on January 28, 2018, at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. It was the first to include a women's Royal Rumble match, and consequently, two Royal Rumble matches, which is now standard for the event.
